Description.Text: Contessa Holiday Apartments is a popular choice amongst travelers in Gold Coast, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities like express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, car park, family room, car hire are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, balcony/terrace, telephone. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. For reliable service and professional staff, Contessa Holiday Apartments caters to your needs.
